tag_list: sonamony, media, technology, business, world-news, international, global, networking, social-media, serial-entrepreneur
overview:
Serial Entrepreneur within digital media, electronics, engineering, networking and computing.

Referred to as Mo or the alias name “WizzGenius” he brings together a whole lot of creativity and knowledge within 3rd party tools and applications, successfully integrating applications so that they communicate together and bringing new fronts.

His vision is somewhat blurred by many avenues which he tries to take in sudden jolts and time, young at the crystal clear age of 20 and ready to burn energy, time and patience is all it will take to create a new fusion of creativity that will maybe one day highlight the work and intensive research that this person has done.

More to write…
